title: Reworked Talon Q
body:
The reworked talon q has an issue I want to address, one of the uses for talon was using his auto reset to splitpush when behind or pushing after killing those in that lane, however now that his q is a direct target spell he doesn't have this option. My idea is to make his q an auto reset at point blank doing the crit, but be like ekko/hecarim e at longer ranges doing a dash auto to target. This would also make doing his combo less clunky for people with experience on pre-rework talon because the new Q being direct target spell is slowing down my combo quite a bit, at least for me it is.

Also with the removal of attackspeed from youmuus the overall pushing power of AD assassins has been reduced as well.

EDIT: Not sure if this is right board for this post, was this board, GD or misc and I wasn't sure so mods feel free to move it to somewhere it suits better if needed.

replies.body: His q is a double auto reset now, it just doesn't work on turrets
Yes I'm aware of that, it is likely designed so that when you hit with full w then engage with q you can apply passive straight away.
I kind of miss the old Talon.  Sure the new one is flashy but he doesn't feel as rewarding to play.
